description: Christophe Ruggia is held over allegations of sexual harassment made by actress Ad¨¨le Haenel.
title: French film director Christophe Ruggia arrested over abuse claims
title_page: French film director Christophe Ruggia arrested over abuse claims - BBC News
maintext: "I did not see that my adulation for her, and the hopes I placed in her, might - given her young age - come across at times as irksome. If this is what happened... I ask her pardon," he said in an earlier statement.
